title: A Dark Place To Die
description: A Dark Place To Die is a psychological thriller set in the dark heart of a cold English city and the searing heat of northern New South Wales.The son of DI Frank Keane's old boss, the legendary DI Memno Koopman, has been discovered dead, lashed to a scaffolding pole on Liverpool's bleak shoreline. For Koopman, who has turned his back on a 30-year career in the city to live the quiet life in rural Australia, the death of a son he never knew means a return to England and the past he left behind.Koopman hasn't been forgotten â€“ not by his former colleagues nor by his enemies. As the body count rises in both countries, Keane and Koopman's search for the killer becomes a fight for survival.
author: Ed Chatterton
